api_gateway_address.description: Origin URL of the API Gateway server. This is a URL with a scheme, a hostname and a port.

block.description: A configuration block, described below, that attempts to authenticate using API-Key.
A configuration block, described below, that attempts to authenticate using AWS-IAM authentication credentials.
A configuration block, described below, that attempts to authenticate using Azure Active Directory authentication.
A configuration block, described below, that attempts to authenticate using email and password.

access_expires.description: Access expiration date in Unix timestamp (select 0 for access without expiry date)

bound_ips.description: A CIDR whitelist with the IPs that the access is restricted to

path.description: The path where the Auth Method will be stored

block.description: A configuration block, described below, using API-Key Auth Method

bound_arn.description: A list of full arns that the access is restricted to

bound_aws_account_id.description: A list of AWS account-IDs that the access is restricted to

bound_resource_id.description: A list of full resource ids that the access is restricted to

bound_role_id.description: A list of full role ids that the access is restricted to

bound_role_name.description: A list of full role-name that the access is restricted to

bound_user_id.description: A list of full user ids that the access is restricted to

bound_user_name.description: A list of full user-name that the access is restricted to

block.description: A configuration block, described below, using AWS-IAM Auth Method

bound_group_id.description: A list of group ids that the access is restricted to

bound_providers.description: A list of resource providers that the access is restricted to (e.g, Microsoft.Compute, Microsoft.ManagedIdentity, etc)

bound_resource_id.description: A list of full resource ids that the access is restricted to

bound_resource_names.description: A list of resource names that the access is restricted to (e.g, a virtual machine name, scale set name, etc)

bound_resource_types.description: A list of resource types that the access is restricted to (e.g, virtualMachines, userAssignedIdentities, etc)

bound_rg_id.description: A list of resource groups that the access is restricted to

bound_spid.description: A list of service principal IDs that the access is restricted to

bound_sub_id.description: A list of subscription ids that the access is restricted to

bound_tenant_id.description: The Azure tenant id that the access is restricted to

jwks_uri.description: The URL to the JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) that containing the public keys that should be used to verify any JSON Web Token (JWT) issued by the authorization server

block.description: A configuration block, described below, using Azure AD Auth Method

audience.description: The audience to verify in the JWT received by the client

service_account_creds_data.description: Service Account creds data, base64 encoded

bound_labels.description: GCE only. A list of GCP labels formatted as "key:value" pairs that must be set on instances in order to authenticate

bound_regions.description: GCE only. A list of regions. GCE instances must belong to any of the provided regions in order to authenticate

bound_zones.description: GCE only. A list of zones. GCE instances must belong to any of the provided zones in order to authenticate

block.description: IAM GCE Auth Method

bound_service_accounts.description: IAM only. A list of Service Accounts. Clients must belong to any of the provided service accounts in order to authenticate

block.description: IAM GCP Auth Method
A configuration block, described below, using Auth Method API-Key

unique_identifier.description: A unique identifier (ID) value should be configured for OAuth2, LDAP and SAML authentication method types and is usually a value such as the email, username, or upn for example

block.description: A configuration block, described below, using SAML Auth Method
Authentication Methods represent machine identities or human identities

analytics_access.description: Allow this role to view analytics. Currently only 'none' and 'own' values are supported, allowing associated auth methods to view reports produced by the same auth methods

audit_access.description: Allow this role to view audit logs. 'none', 'own', and 'all' values are supported, allowing associated auth methods to view audit logs produced by the same auth methods

sub_claims.description: key/val of sub claims, e.g group=admins,developers

block.description: Create an association between role and auth method

capability.description: List of the approved/denied capabilities in the path options: [read, create, update, delete, list, deny]

path.description: The path the rule refers to

block.description: Set a rule to a role
Role Resource

multiline_value.description:
The provided value is a multiline value (separated by '
')

path.description: The path where the secret will be stored.

block.description: Static secret Resource

path.description: The path where the secret is stored. Defaults to the latest version.

block.description: Auth Method data source

path.description: The path where the secret is stored. Defaults to the latest version.

block.description: Dynamic Secret data source
Role data source

path.description: The path where the secret is stored

block.description: Reads any secret data (currently support Static/Dynamic)

path.description: The path where the secret is stored. Defaults to the latest version.

block.description: Static secret data source
